es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.core.feature

Class SimpleFeatureData<I,F,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.core.feature.SimpleFeatureData<I,F,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of the items
    F - type of the features
    V - type of the information about item-feature pairs
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureData<I,F,V>, FeatureIndex<F>, ItemIndex<I>

    public class SimpleFeatureData<I,F,V>
extends Object
implements FeatureData<I,F,V>
    Simple map-based feature data.

    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)

      • load

        public static <I,F,V> SimpleFeatureData<I,F,V> load(String path,
                                                    Parser<I> iParser,
                                                    Parser<F> fParser,
                                                    Parser<V> vParser)
                                             throws IOException
        Load feature data from a file. Each line is a different item-feature pair, with tab-separated fields indicating item, feature and other information.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of the items
        F - type of the features
        V - type of the information about item-feature pairs
        Parameters:
        path - file path
        iParser - item type parser
        fParser - feature type parser
        vParser - information type parser
        Returns:
        a simple map-based FeatureData
        Throws:
        IOException - when path does not exist or IO error

      • load

        public static <I,F,V> SimpleFeatureData<I,F,V> load(InputStream in,
                                                    Parser<I> iParser,
                                                    Parser<F> fParser,
                                                    Parser<V> vParser)
                                             throws IOException
        Load feature data from a input stream. Each line is a different item-feature pair, with tab-separated fields indicating item, feature and other information.
        Type Parameters:
        I - type of the items
        F - type of the features
        V - type of the information about item-feature pairs
        Parameters:
        in - input stream
        iParser - item type parser
        fParser - feature type parser
        vParser - information type parser
        Returns:
        a simple map-based FeatureData
        Throws:
        IOException - when IO error
